turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Ulriksbanen.
turn.2: Ulriksbanen  Ulriksbanen is a passenger aerial tramway in Bergen, Norway.
turn.3: Is it a popular tourist trap?
turn.4: It connects the mountain Ulriken to the city, and is frequently used by tourists as well as locals.
turn.6: The tramway was first thought of by Frithjof Meidell Andersen in 1954, and a company was established in 1959.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: After having been constructed by a Swiss company, Ulriksbanen opened in 1961.
turn.10: The first and only accident in the history of Ulriksbanen happened in 1974.
turn.12: During the six first months of the year, a record-breaking 91,000 had travelled with the tramway.
